RAYMOND CHUNG

FULL STACK DESIGNER & FRONT-END DEVELOPER

HI! I AM RAYMOND

I am a fourth year Computer Science & Education student at Queen's University with a huge passion for entrepreneurship, mobile (iOS) and web development hailing from Toronto, Ontario. As a self-taught Full Stack Designer & Front-End Developer, I enjoy creating things that appeal visually and usable, where I hope to apply my skills within the work field . Away from the computer, I enjoy cooking, playing basketball and soccer and watching shows.

I am currently a Research Assistant at Queen's Faculty of Computing researching software modelling and model-driven development (MDD).
